name: Hia Consulting
tag_list: hia, consulting--it-consulting, information-technology, hia-consulting, process-consulting, quality-consulting, security-consulting, iso-standards, auditors, audits, six-sigma, lean, business-continuity, iso, iso-9001, iso-27001, iso-20000
overview:
A subsidiary of Hia Technologies, Hia Consulting is a new breed of strategy, Information Management and Enterprise Technology Consulting. We are dedicated to bringing clients pragmatic IT strategy and firm, cost-effective implementation services. This is accomplished using the set of practices that complement one another. We are committed to be a competent Service Provider with a flair for quality in everything we do. Our engagement models are flexible, scalable, secure and custom defined based on specific individual needs of our customers, thereby ensuring that we follow the right strategy to ensure business transformations, lower operational costs and quick time to market.

A combination of consulting and technical expertise constitutes the team of consultants at Hia Consulting. Our strong integration of strategy with industry leading technical knowhow packages knowledge eliminates gaps and reworks to deliver solutions that provide real valueâ€”quickly and cost-effectively.. We ensure 100% success for our customers business thereby strengthening the relationship and being mutually benefited. While we comprise our valuable assets â€“ People, Process and Partners, we also have Mission, Vision and Values to guarantee breakthrough solutions that would enhance customer satisfaction. Why do organizations choose HIA Consulting to help tackle their toughest business and operational challenges?

Because HIA Consulting is a different kind of firm - Lean, fast-paced and entrepreneurial to the core, we pride ourselves on building a culture of independent thinkers and doers â€“ individuals who will make a difference to the clients they serve. Since 2007, clients have trusted Hia Consulting to work with them to help solve their most important business problems. We have earned this trust by giving every problem the utmost senior-level attention; by researching and understanding the facts before drawing conclusions; by our steadfast commitment to objectivity; and by demonstrating time and again that leadership makes all the difference. Read More

Whether serving as trusted advisers or in interim management roles, HIA Consulting stands for leadership, problem solving and value creation. Our professionals bring a tailored approach to each and every assignment, with a unique set of objectives, requiring a specific set of priorities designed to deliver results. With an operational heritage and depth of senior resources, Hia Consulting teams are able to rapidly diagnose and execute practical solutions in complex business environments by:

Understanding Opportunities and Challenges
Collaborating and Listening
Planning and Partnering
Building Consensus
Supporting and Guiding / Leading
Establishing a Self-Sustaining Organization
